title: The Pinkaboos, Bitterly and the Giant Problem
description: The Pinkaboos is an empowering new chapter books series for young readers age 6-9, that presents the challenges of childhood through the thrilling and magical world of the Pinkaboos. Each story is an amazing way to connect with your child about how they feel and think about the world around them. For best friends Bitterly, Abyssma, and Belladonna, this is going to be the best year ever as they are starting a new school year at Fright School! As young frights they'll learn how to chase aware the fears of little human children by entering their dreams and teaching them how to overcome nightmares. But when Bitterly, the most promising fright, is faced with a school bully and some nightmares of her own, she finds help from the last place she expected-the little girl whom she has sworn to protect. Praise for the Pinkaboos chapter books from the author of Monster "Facing fears has never been so much fun. The Pinkaboos are ah-dorable!" -Lisi Harrison, author of The Clique, Alphas, Monster High, Pretenders.
author: Jake Gosselin
